title: What is the meaning of 'When You're Smiling' by Billie Holiday? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is just a song about being as cheerful and happy as you can be so that you can attract cheerful people with a happy attitude and a positive attitude. If you study the words you may learn a lot that can be helpful. Many performers have used the song. Here are the Billie Holiday lyrics for the song: “When you're smiling When you're smiling The whole world smiles with you When you're laughing When you're laughing The sun comes shining through But when you're crying You bring on the rain So stop your sighing, be happy again”—Billie Holiday - When You're Smiling Lyrics
